definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Santa Cruz Island, off the California coast

sentences.english: Hearing that song always reminds me of a certain night in Santa Claus.
sentences.chinese: 每当听到这首歌，总令我想起在圣克鲁斯的夜晚。

sentences.english: The quake struck near the Santa Cruz Islands, which are part of the Solomon Islands nation.
sentences.chinese: 地震发生在所罗门群岛境内的圣克鲁斯群岛附近。

sentences.english: A similar system is planned for Santa Cruz island next year.
sentences.chinese: 计划明年为圣克鲁斯岛安装同样的系统。

sentences.english: The San Rafael Valley's topography and geology forms the headwaters of the Santa Cruz River.
sentences.chinese: 圣拉斐尔山谷的地形和地质形成圣克鲁斯河的源头。

sentences.english: The accused include prominent opposition politicians from the eastern city of Santa Cruz.
sentences.chinese: 被告包括来自东部圣克鲁斯城市著名的反对派政客。

sentences.english: University of Santa Cruz is up north.

definition: Phoenix, capital of Arizona/also 鳳凰城|凤凰城[Feng4 huang2 cheng2]
Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
St Louis, large city in eastern Missouri
